name: Desgate
description:
Fight as a noble, disembodied warrior,  struggling in order to regain his power.

Conquer waves of enemies as they pour out of the Desgates, dimensional rifts in which reside hordes of monsters.

Use the power of your lightning sword to defeat the monsters of the Desgates, and avenge your hometown, by slaying Amarouq the Destroyer.

Unlock Skins by killing the boss.                                                                                                                    

Music By @synthguyyy. Check him out on insta, his music is sick so if any game devs need music check his page.

Please read the How to Play. It's kinda important.

 By A - Half of Nakel Games

Story Written by Joseph Ingham
